name: TestJSONParser
description: Unit tests for JSONParser utility methods.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONStringValue
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of a string value from a JSON string using JSONParser.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValue
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of an integer value from a JSON string using JSONParser.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONStringValueThrowException
test_cases.description: Tests that JSONParser throws a JSONException when trying to retrieve a string value using an invalid key.

test_cases.name: testGetJSONIntValueThrowException
test_cases.description: Tests that JSONParser throws a JSONException when trying to retrieve an integer value using an invalid key.
